        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            
          
          
            
            Make sure to set the security type as **`oauth2`** when defining the scopes. Also when defining the roles under a particular scope, put them under **x-scopes-bindings:**  as a scope name and roles mapping.
